profile:
Did you we are a Lennox dealer?  #lennoxstrong We go out of our way to find the best brands available that offer the best warranty/quality available to save you from having to do that research, you are in great hands when you call us !

We are very honoured that Rogers Media did this video of our company sharing how much we care about our clients feel free to copy and paste this link - https://www.facebook.com/RogersForBusiness/posts/1526593684061732 
 
As an owner-operated local company that has been in business for over 16 years, we are proud to accept Homestars ˜Best of” Award for 8 consecutive years in a row. Here’s to a great year, and many more to come.
 
Starting in the trade in 1995 and working the different sectors learning some amazing experiences while taking annual courses to learn each manufacture James Smith created Natural Choice Heating & Cooling with two things in mind, caring for the client and caring about the employee.  With those in mind was the inception and created over a decade and half of the highest quality of workmanship and we rolled out our red carpet treatment.  Each employee proudly takes pictures of every installation from a thermostat to full custom ductwork installations, no project is too little.   Our team of 10 well trained techs are willing and ready to take on any project you have.
 
Here at Natural Choice Heating & Cooling it has been our pleasure to offer the highest level of reliable comfort control for the Whitby, Durham, GTA, Kawartha Lakes & surrounding community for over a decade and half. Our foundation consists of efficient, reliable and cost effective heating, furnace, air conditioning, tankless and indoor air quality products.  Along with ductless systems offered in Heat Pumps by different manufactures include Mitsubishi, Fujitsu, Samsung & LG's Art Cool system.  We are also a leader in tankless systems installing Rinnai's for over a decade and half as an Authorized Service Provider for Rinnai.
 
From start to finish, our experienced estimators, project managers and technicians provide the expertise to ensure your project is completed on time, on budget and up to code. We understand that service interruptions are an inconvenience and cost you productivity so we focus on providing expedient services to get you back online as soon as possible without risking the safety of your valuable equipment. We are also absolutely committed to safety and provide ongoing education to our personnel to ensure complete compliance with the best practices and standards.
 
We offer our services to the following areas - Markham, Uxbridge, Richmond Hill, Scarborough, Cobourg, Port Hope, Unionville, Vaughan, Port Perry, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Courtice, Bowmanville, Lindsay, Peterborough
 
To learn more about our company you can visit us by clicking the buttons below:
Website - http://www.naturalchoiceheatingcooling.ca
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/NaturalChoiceHeatingCooling
Twitter - https://twitter.com/NaturalChoiceHC/ 
 
We service the following brands Trane, Amana, Rinnai, Navien, Goodman, American Standard, Lennox, NTI, EcoBee, Monessen, Montigo, Napoleon Fireplaces,  LG COOL ART ductless, & SO much more!

profile:
Heating and Cooling is what we do, but family is at the heart of who we are. For more than 13 years, we haven’t just been your trusted comfort partner; we’ve been the Ashton Family business.  Priding ourselves on prompt, professional service, we work hard to give you and your family the value and quality that you deserve. 

We offer no cost, no pressure in home consultations to answer all of your questions about purchasing new appliances like furnaces, air conditioners, fireplaces and more. You can breathe easy with a detailed duct cleaning service, or talk to a comfort advisor about how you can reduce dust, eliminate cold rooms and save money with the Aeroseal Duct Sealing process that seals your ducts from the inside.

Don’t wait days for service, or wait on hold for hours, and enjoy a variety of flexible payment options, including financing, that make doing business with us easy. We even offer monthly maintenance and protection plans for your appliances so you can stop worrying about surprise repair bills. Hey- that’s what family is for, right? 

Contact us today and let us help you Be More Comfortable.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Dynamic Brick and Stone
We are a company that builds and repairs stone and brick. 
Our goal as a company is achieving total customer satisfaction. Our passion is designing and building quality, one of a kind, stone and brick features for your home.

We build and design
Fireplaces, walkways, patios, back splashes, outdoor and indoor walls, dry-lay stone walls and artistic centerpieces.
And so much more! 

Replace and repair services include:

Replace all damaged brick and stone, 
Repair all cracked or damaged joints,
Replace broken or damaged flagstone,
Sealing or re-sealing flagstone,
Power washing dirt and grime off all patios, walkways and homes.
